title: AE插件-黑白圆点填充半调风格特效m’s Halftone v1.4.8 Win/Mac
author: 大众脸
content: m’s Halftone 是一款用于 After Effects 的半色调处理插件，操作简单，只需将效果添加到图层即可，无需图层贴图。支持自定义圆点的填充风格、大小、旋转等参数，适用于黑白图像的半调风格特效制作。

other.plugin_description_en: m’s Halftone is an After Effects plugin that performs halftone processing. It’s very easy to use: just add the effect to the layer without any need for layer maps.
